summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 CHEVROLET CRUZE. WHILE THE VEHICLE WAS IN REVERSE, WITH THE BRAKE PEDAL DEPRESSED, THE BRAKE PEDAL BECAME DIFFICULT TO DEPRESS AND FAILED TO STOP THE VEHICLE. THE FAILURE RECURRED EACH TIME THE BRAKE PEDAL WAS DEPRESSED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO PADDOCK CHEVROLET (LOCATED AT 3232 DELAWARE AVE KENMORE, NY 14217) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE BRAKE VACUUM PUMP AND PIPE ASSEMBLY WERE MISSING FROM THE VEHICLE AND COULD NOT BE REPAIRED UNDER THE WARRANTY DUE TO THE MISSING PART. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 28,800.
